description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Nut & Seed Mix recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Nut & Seed Mix Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g mixed nuts (cashews, pecans, walnuts, hazel nuts, almonds, cashews)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 150oC. Whisk egg white in a large mixing bowl until foamy.
Add sugar and spices and whisk through.
Add nuts, pepitas and seeds to the spice mixture and stir well to evenly coat. Spread into a roasting pan in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 120Â°C. Add sultanas and stir well. Cook for a further 15 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oven and cool in pan.
When cold, store in an airtight container for 2 weeks.
